Contact Home Signage & Perspex Frames Perspex Acrylic Poster Photo Frames Staff Photo Boards For Schools & Business Staff Photo Boards For Schools & Business £ 36.30 ex. VAT £ inc.VAT Options Colour: Black Back Panel White Back Panel Clear Back Panel Clear Frost Back Panel Coloured Back Panel 2: 2: Qty Add to basket Get a quote Staff Photo Notice Boards - Perspex Acrylic Staff photo notice boards, or "Meet The Team" boards are a perfect way of letting people know who's who in a school, NHS Wards, general office and commercial workplace, recreation centres, reception areas, etc. Each clear pocket allows a small photo of a relevent member of staff. Options available include: choice of back acrylic colour, the number of photo pockets. We also offer a secure, tamper proof version, please click here for further details. NEW! We can now offer staff boards with your name and logo printed directlty to the top of the display - call for details. Features and Benefits: Please double click on the above images of our acrylic staff photo boards to zoom into a more detailed view Staff photo boards provide a professioal looking wall mounted display panel for quick reference of staff / team members Choice of black, white, clear or clear frost 5mm thick acrylic back panel with polished edges. Corners are rounded with no sharp edges Clear acrylic photo pockets allow staff photos to be changed quickly and easily Supplied with 4 polished sign fittings to give that floating effect off a wall Each photo pocket size is 75mm high x 50mm wide Header panel pocket is 260mm wide x 50mm high Please see the table below for our standard sized staff photo boards. We also manufacture custom sized boards if you require different sized pockets or different quantities of pockets - please call us on 01202 480104 for further details. Staff photo board prices are detailed in the drop down menu at the top of the page. Manufactured to order in our factory in Christchurch, Dorset, UK. Please allow 5 working days for delivery Please see our stand off fittings instructions by clicking here Looking for a a more secure staff photo board which can't be tampered with? Check out our Secure Staff Photo Boards ! Looking for a staff photo board with a different coloured back panel? We have a range of colours available other than our standard colours listed! Please contact us for a quote. Looking for a staff photo board with bespoke printing and branding to suit your business? With state of the art printers, we are able to fully print or brand these staff boards with your logos and messages! If this is something you are interested in, contact us for a quote! Code Photo Pockets Frame Size Width x Height (mm) SB10 10 430mm x 325mm SB20 20 430mm x 515mm SB30 30 500mm x 610mm SB40 40 640mm x 610mm SB50 50 780mm x 610mm SB60 60 780mm x 705mm SB65 65 800mm x 740mm SB70 70 780mm x 800mm SB80 80 780mm x 895mm SB100 100 780mm x 1085mm SB120 120 920mm x 1085mm SB140 140 1060mm x 1085mm SB160 160 1200mm x 1090mm Displays UK provide daily deliveries to most towns and cities in the UK including: Christchurch, Poole, Bournemouth, Swanage, Dorchester, Ferndown, Shaftesbury Sherborne Sturminster Newton Swanage Weymouth Ringwood New Forest Fordingbridge Salisbury Thank you for visiting our website Product Code: 64674569876345 Specification Code 64674569876345 Style Staff Photo Board Location Wall Mounted Weight 10.000 Kg Secured by sagePay Pay with PayPal Pay with Mastercard Pay with Visa × Items Quick basket Newsletter Signup Submit Exhibition Stands Outdoor Displays Display Cases Exhibition & Display Boards for Hire or Rent Leaflet, Brochure, Menu & Card Holders Banner Stands Counters & Plinths Noticeboards & Whiteboards Signage & Perspex Frames Display Boards Specialist Displays Perspex Cut To Size Displays (UK) Limited Displays UK are located in Christchurch, on the Hampshire / Dorset border. We are a proper 'bricks and mortar' manufacturing business not just another internet retailer.
